reference.title: Paraguay
reference.shortdesc: Applicability: All devices supporting UHF RIFID and sold in Paraguay Translation: In Paraguay, this equipment must be configured to operate with the limitations established in the Technical Standard NTC-RF-918: 2020 of CONATEL En Paraguay este equipo deberá ser configurado para operar con las limitaciones establecidas en la Norma Técnica NTC-RF-918:2020 de la CONATEL
